feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v2.0.50
entry.content:
Launching Auth's desktop app ðŸš€

This release introduces desktop apps for Auth on Linux, MacOS and Windows.

What's Changed

  • Authy guide rewrite by @greeeen-dev in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1088
  • Add rockstar games icon by @shubhisroking in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1125
  • Custom icons by @ludespeedny in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1194
  • Desktop Release Candidate by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1133
  • Fix error on windows and linux by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1200
  • Libffi error for appimage by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1203
  • feat: rounded icons for auth desktop by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1215
  • Add CERN Icon by @subhashissuara in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1226
  • Auth desktop by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1234
  • Auth Desktop by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1235
  • fix: macos sha256 sum generation by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1236
  • Add Context menu to desktop right click by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1247
  • Bump auth to 2.0.50 build number by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1248

New Contributors

  • @shubhisroking made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1125
  • @ludespeedny made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1194
  • @subhashissuara made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v2.0.41...auth-v2.0.50

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v2.0.54
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIX] libffi7 missing error in auth appimage by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1257
  • [auth] Add new custom icons in auth by @ialexanderbrito in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1258
  • [FIX] Auth Desk by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1262
  • [FIX] Smart auth revert, issue #1279 by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1340
  • [auth] Prioritise issuer match in search result order by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1362
  • [FIX] RPM build by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1368
  • Uppercase auth by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1371
  • [FIX] Compile of AppImage by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1369
  • [FIX] Appimage build by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1377
  • [FIX] updatedb command by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1383

New Contributors

  • @ialexanderbrito made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1258

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v2.0.50...auth-v2.0.54

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] Potential fix for keyboard popup not working while focusing onâ€¦ by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1428
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1240
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1456
  • [FIX] Rpm build for Auth by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1466
  • chore: bump version for auth to 256 by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1573
  • [FIX] Handle Steam host by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1539
  • [auth] Update Simple Icons by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1641
  • [FEAT] Pinning and Tags by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1541
  • fix(auth): set maxlength limit of 100 to tags by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1733
  • [auth] Bump version: 2.0.58 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1736
  • [FIX] Auth Macos build by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1746
  • [auth] Bump version to v3.0.0 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1752
  • [auth] iOS build changes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1758
  • [auth] Bump Podfile for Sentry Macos by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1757

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v2.0.55...auth-v3.0.1
